observations.customer_retention: The majority of customers have terminated their contracts, with only one current customer remaining.
observations.acquisition_preference: Most customers were acquired through external channels.
observations.sector_focus: All customers belong to the aerospace sector.
observations.regional_focus: The Northeast region has the highest number of customers.
observations.company_age: A significant portion of customers are relatively new companies (0-5 years).
observations.size_preference: Small-sized companies form the majority of the customer base.
observations.contract_type: Maker contracts are slightly more common than advanced contracts.
observations.revenue_distribution: Revenue is fairly evenly split between maker and advanced contracts.
observations.clv_variability: There is a wide range in expected CLV, indicating variability in customer value.
